screens.question: Limited capital, want neutral trade. Best fit?
screens.explanation_correct: Butterflies are debit trades with small entry cost ($50-$200 typical).
screens.explanation_wrong: Butterflies generally require the least capital; condors/iron butterflies need margin for max loss.
